data: MASA Li et al. (2024e)
To-tāi-lí kò͘-kò͘, ū choan-bûn ê hong-hiám kap hôe-pò tāi-lí
Ēng hôe-pò chòe ín-chō ki-chè, lâi cheng-ka chhek-lio̍k ê to-iūⁿ-sèng
Iû-kî chhut-sek ê hong-hiám tiâu-chéng hôe-pò, tī CSI300, DJIA, S&P500
FreQuant Jeon et al. (2024)
Pîn-lu̍t léng-he̍k hun-sek, iōng-lâi piān-sek bô͘-sek
Thàu-kòe DFT chòe to-lia̍p-tō͘ chu-sán piáu-hiān
ARR: cheng-ka 2.1×, Tī chhī-tiûⁿ choán-piàn sî ū cheng-kiông ê ún-tēng-sèng
EarnMore Zhang et al. (2024d)
Khó-tēng-chè ê tâu-chu cho͘-ha̍p-tî, ū khó-chhia-iám ê thong-hêng-chèng
Chū-ngó͘ kàm-tok ê chhia-iám kap tiông-kiàn
Lī-sǹg: +40%, Hong-hiám chúi-pêng siong-tâng
TrendTrader Ding et al. (2024b)
Kè-siàu kap chêng-sū ê to-bô͘-thài iông-ha̍p
Khong-sî chài-seng ha̍k-si̍p (RL) kò͘-kò͘
ARR, ASR, MDD piáu-hiān chhut-sek tī DJIA, SSE-50
Network-EDM Hui and Wang (2024)
Thàu-kòe bāng-lō͘ lí-lūn chòe ke̍k-toan hong-hiám kàng-kē
Iōng siōng-tōa to̍k-li̍p chi̍p lâi chòe to-kak-hòa
Tī chhī-tiûⁿ soe-thè sî, tī CSI 300 piáu-hiān iû-kî chhut-sek
Market-Graph Yamagata and Ono (2024)
Kin-kù chhī-tiûⁿ tô͘-hêng ê chū-chi̍p, iōng-lâi tui-chong chí-sò͘
Iōng goân-sí-tùi-ngó͘ hun-lia̍t chòe kau-e̍k-liōng hi-sò͘ kui-hoān-hòa
Tī S&P500 téng chí-sò͘, ū khah koân ê Sharpe pí-lu̍t
LLM-Alpha Kou et al. (2024)
Kin-kù LLM ê alpha in-sò͘ khai-chhái
To-tāi-lí hē-thóng, ū tōng-thài koân-tiōng khui-koan
Hôe-pò: +53.17% tùi-pí chhī-tiûⁿ -11.73% (Tiong-kok, 2023)
